users
Class InstructorPreferences

java.lang.Object
  users.InstructorPreferences

public class InstructorPreferences
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the instructor's preferences of courses he wants to teach and days and times he wants to work.
Invariants:

  • none

Version:
May 27, 2011: Class created.
Author:
David, Jonathan: changed return type of getInstructorPreferences

getInstructorFeedback

public InstructorFeedback getInstructorFeedback(Schedule the_schedule,
                                                User the_instructor)
This method compares every course/day/time assigned to this instructor with the courses/days/times he wants to teach.
Preconditions:
  • the schedule != null
  • the instructor != null
Postconditions:
  • does not return null

Parameters:
the_schedule - The schedule of courses
the_instructor - The instructor for whom the collection of unwanted sections is prepared
Returns:
The collection of unwanted sections
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the schedule or the instructor == null
